item.title: About Me
item.description:
<h3>Areas of Expertise</h3>
<ul>
  <li><strong>Mobile Development:</strong> Cross-platform applications using Flutter and React Native</li>
  <li><strong>Backend Systems:</strong> Scalable server architectures, APIs, and microservices</li>
  <li><strong>Cloud & DevOps:</strong> AWS infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization</li>
  <li><strong>Systems Design:</strong> Performance optimization and low-level programming</li>
</ul>

<p>My main focus is on Go, Flutter, and JavaScript/TypeScript, often delving into low-level programming. Outside of my professional work, I love playing around with various projects and constantly trying out new things.</p>

<p>You can reach me at <a href="mailto:blog@sarray.de">blog@sarray.de</a>.</p>

item.title: Mein erster Blogpost
item.description:
Mein erster* Blogpost

Hallo Welt!

Das ist mein erster Blogpost. Ich freue mich, dass du hier bist!
